PlayerInputManager
MonoBehaviour
[RequireComponent(typeof(PlayerMovement))]
public
PlayerInputManager

Manages all the inputs of the player

Handling the player inputs

Handle multiple inputs at the same time, an if the controller or keyboard can be used during gameplay.

Unique combinations

Every cobination of cammands have a single and unique binary combination, due to the enum Inputs.

See Also

Inputs

Private Variables
Controller Variables
_playerControllerIndex

Stores the index of the player controller used to identify a player in the Rewired plugin.  Value set to 0, since there is only 1 player.

_playerController

Stores the Player object witch is used to retrieve the controller inputs from the joystick or keyboard.

_controllerDeadZone

Analog inputs bellow this number are ignored.

Jump Parameters
_maxTime

The maximum time that the player can hold the jump button.  After that time, the player will start to fall.

Input Handler Variables
_curentInputs

The inputs of the player during a given frame.

External Classes
About

Classes that handle the opperations given by the player Inputs

Vars
_playerMovement

Controlls the movement of the player (PlayerMovement)

_playerJump

Controlls the jumping action of the player (PlayerJump)

_playerGrounder

Checks if the player is touching the ground (PlayerGrounder)

Controller Lock Parameters
About

Parameters that are used to determin if the controller can be used or not at a given frame.

Bools
_dashing

True if the player is Dashing.

_isGrounded

True if the player is touching the ground.

Public Variables

Variable: OnPause Action that gives a signal when the player pressed the pause button

OnPause
public static Action OnPause
Properties
Helper Properties
About

Properties that help the player to acess certein informations faster.

Vars
MoveDirection

Value between -1 & 1 that determins if the player is going Left or Right.

PlayerId

Returns the index of the player controller.

Unity Methods
Awake
private void Awake()

Handles the initialization of the class, by caling the Setup Methods

OnDestroy
private void OnDestroy()

Handles the class right before the destruction of the GameObject, by calling the Destruction Methods

Update
void Update()

Handles the functions that need to be called every frame.

  • Get the inputs. (GetInputs)

  • Decide what to do. (DecisionMaking)

Setup Methods
SubscribeFunctions
private void SubscribeFunctions()

Subscribe the Listeners Methods to their respective signals

AssociatePlayer
private void AssociatePlayer()

Associates the Player Controller the the right input method, by default is the joystick.

GetEssentialComponentsComponent
private void GetEssentialComponentsComponent()
About

Get the necesserie componentes from the gameObject. (Components found at External Classes)

Destruction Methods
UnsubscribeFunctins
private void UnsubscribeFunctins()

Remove the subscription of the Listeners, subscribed at SubscribeFunctions.

Input Handling

Functions that get the inputs from the controller or keyboard

GetInputs
private void GetInputs()

  • Resetes the curent inputs.

  • Gather all the Inputs att the given frame.

GetMovement
private void GetMovement()

Gets the movement action from the curent input method.

GetPause
private void GetPause()

Gets the Pause button action from the current input method.

GetJump
private void GetJump()

Gets the jump action from the curent input method.

Decision Making

Decides witch comands can or cannot be executed at a given frame.

DecisionMaking
private void DecisionMaking()

Runs a series of statements to decide witch actions to call at a given frame.

Calling Functions

Functions that redirect the commads to their specific class.  About:: These are the functions called at Decision Making

Pause
private void Pause()

Calls the event to activate the Puase Scene.

Move
private void Move()

Calls the movement Function from PlayerMovement.

Jump
private void Jump()

Cals the Jump Function from PlayerJump

Controller LockDown

Decides if the controller can be used or not at a given frame.

IsControllerLocked
private bool IsControllerLocked()

Determins if the controller can be used or not at a given moment.

Listeners

Methods that listen to Signals

ListenDash
private void ListenDash(
bool isDashing
)

Function that Listen to the Action that detirmins if the player is dashing or not.

Parameters
isDashing
bool

Boolean that recieves the info if the player is dashing or not.

ListenGrounder
private void ListenGrounder(
bool isGrounded
)

Function that Listen to the Action that detirmins if the player is grounded or not.

Parameters
isGrounded
bool

Boolean that recieves the info if the player is grounded or not.
